title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Average attendance has decreased over the Year
Average attendance is roughly constant from 2008 to 2019.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Average attendance about 64831.0 was recorded at Year 2016
Min Average attendance about 60890.0 was recorded at Year 2012
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2012 to 2016.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2012.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2016 to 2019.
